all stages: R&D design, technical evaluation, processing & manufacturing, and product installation. It is supply chains, digital transformation, a culture of excellence among employees, and social responsibility.
committed to providing high-performance products to the market, complying with ASTM, NFRC, CSA, and
AS/NZS standards. Over 10 years of data collection, Bucalu's products have achieved energy savings of 20%-36%, equivalent to

certification.

Important Notice & Disclaimer
1. Product Specifications & Changes: Dimensions shown are approximate and subject to variation. The manufacturer reserves the right to discontinue or modify any product, specification, or design without prior notice. The manufacturer is not responsible for discrepancies arising from the use of outdated or unverified documents.
2. Project-Specific Data: For all engineering and construction purposes, contact us to confirm final dimensions and specifications before order placement.
3. Color Representation: All product colors and finishes shown are for reference only. There may be variations between on-screen/printed images and the actual
product. The physical product shall prevail.
4. Performance Data: Performance values are derived from controlled laboratory tests and represent maximum achievable results under ideal conditions. Actual
performance in the field may vary based on installation, site conditions, size, configuration, and glazing options.
5, Product Images: Illustrations and photos may not accurately represent the exact configuration or optional features of the product shipped and are for illustrative
purposes only.
6. Information Accuracy: While every effort is made to ensure accuracy, all information is subject to change without notice. The manufacturer disclaims all liability for
any direct or indirect loss resulting from the use of information in this brochure. For the most current specifications, always consult our official resources.
